channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13826] Make VectorUDFAdaptor work for GenericUDFBetween when used as FILTER
item.description: GenericUDFBetween doesn't vectorize with VectorUDFAdaptor when used as FILTER (i.e. as single item for WHERE).
item.summary: Make VectorUDFAdaptor work for GenericUDFBetween when used as FILTER

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:

mmccline Would you also like to commit this to branch-2.1?
branch-2.1 has already been cut. master is on 2.2 now If you want this to be in 2.1 release then its need to be committed to 2.1-branch specifically.
